name: Hotstylz
description: '''Hotstylz''' is an American [[Hip hop music|hip hop]] group from [[Chicago|Chicago, Illinois]], formed in 2007. The trio, composed of [[Midwest rap]]pers Krazee (Kryss Johnson), Meatball (Garren Hodge), and Raydio G (Raymond Jones), signed with [[Yung Joc]]'s record label Swagg Team, an imprint of [[Zomba Group|Zomba]] and [[RCA Records]] to release their 2008 debut single "[[Lookin Boy]]" (featuring Yung Joc). The song peaked within the top 50 of the [[Billboard Hot 100|''Billboard'' Hot 100]] and remains their [[One-hit wonder|only charting release]]. They have released three mixtapesâ€”''A.D.D.'' (2009), ''Where Yall Been At'' (2011) and ''We Back'' (2016).
